schemes.name: Sustainable Farming Incentive (SFI)
schemes.description: Our SFI journey focuses on fostering a biodiverse ecosystem while maintaining productivity. Key initiatives include grass buffer strips to prevent runoff and support wildlife, a three-year legume fallow to boost pollinators and soil health, and low-input managed grassland. We also practice traditional hay-making to encourage wildflowers.
details: Grass buffer strips for biodiversity and erosion control.

schemes.name: Countryside Stewardship (Higher Tier)
schemes.description: In partnership with Surrey Wildlife Trust, we are restoring our SSSI to a wildlife oasis through conservation grazing. We have undertaken significant ditch management and culvert replacement to enable cattle movement, ensuring the land is managed effectively for biodiversity.

schemes.name: Landscape Recovery
schemes.description: Collaborating on large-scale ecosystem restoration projects to connect habitats across the wider landscape.
